TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl
.class public auto ansi TreeView extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件在树结构（其中的项可以展开和折叠）中显示分层数据。

span.span: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象的集合 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 下图显示了一个简单的 。The following illustration shows a simple . ![TreeView 图](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 图")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 的内容 是 可以包含丰富内容（如和控件）的控件 。The contents of a are controls that can contain rich content, such as and controls. 可以包含一个或多个 对象作为其子对象。A can contain one or more objects as its descendants. 定义为对象的层次结构 。A is defined as a hierarchy of objects. 通过绑定到数据源和使用对象，可以填充其树 。A can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using objects. 数据源的示例包括 和 对象。Examples of data sources include and objects. 显示大量项可能会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [优化性能：控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls) 。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls) for more information. 若要提高性能 ，请参阅 [如何：提高 TreeView 的性能](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview)。To improve the performance of a , see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview). 有关控件的详细信息 ，请参阅 [TreeView 概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview). 具有有限的级别数。A has a limited number of levels. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## 自定义 TreeView 控件Customizing the TreeView Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [TreeView 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 。The following example shows how to create a . [!code-xaml[TreeViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSimple/CS/Window1.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数提供的事件数据 `e` 包含 和 。The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an and a . 设置为之前选择的项，或者， `null` 如果没有之前选择的项，则设置为。The is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item. 同样，将 设置为新选定项， `null` 如果未选择任何新项，则设置为。Similarly, the is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 项的属性值设置为时，控件的属性为只读属性，并且设置为项 `true` 。The property on the control is a read-only property and is set to an item when the property value of the item is set to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取属性的值 。The following example shows how to get the value of the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedValue As Object

summary.span: 获取由 的 指定的属性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the property that is the specified by for the .

value.span: 由 的 指定的属性的值；如果没有选定任何项，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property that is specified by the for the , or if no item is selected.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定属性的路径，该属性用于确定属性的值 。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假定将 绑定到类型的对象的集合 `Employee` ，该集合具有两个名为和的 `EmployeeName` 属性 `EmployeeNumber` 。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeNumber`. 您可以使用 在中显示的值 `EmployeeName` ，并将设置 为 `"EmployeeNumber"` ，以使 返回值 `EmployeeNumber` 。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 属性为只读属性。The property is a read-only property. 若要更改中选定项的值 ，请使用 属性访问 。To change the value of a selected item in a , use the property to access the . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 ，它使用 来显示的 `EmployeeName` 和 `EmployeeWorkDay` 属性 `Employee` ，并将属性设置 为 `EmployeeNumber` 。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 当你在中选择一个时 `EmployeeName` ，将 设置为 `EmployeeNumber` 。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSelectedValue#SelectedValuePath](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSelectedValue/CS/Window1.xaml#selectedvaluepath)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定属性的路径，该属性用于确定属性的值 。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假定将 绑定到类型的对象的集合 `Employee` ，该集合具有两个名为和的 `EmployeeName` 属性 `EmployeeNumber` 。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeNumber`. 您可以使用 在中显示的值 `EmployeeName` ，并将设置 为 `"EmployeeNumber"` ，以使 返回值 `EmployeeNumber` 。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 ，它使用 来显示的 `EmployeeName` 和 `EmployeeWorkDay` 属性 `Employee` ，并将属性设置 为 `EmployeeNumber` 。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 当你在中选择一个时 `EmployeeName` ，将 设置为 `EmployeeNumber` 。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`.
